Juan Pelizzari<juane1@outlook.com> 在 2025年3月19日 周三 20:52 写道：
Thank you very much!!

Our agreement with Cammus was as follows: They sent us three complete direct-drive rigs, we participated in different competitions using Cammus skins, we created videos on social media showcasing the products, and we promoted the brand in the Argentine simracing community. They gave us a special discount code, with which we collected commissions on sales. The agreement worked very well, but Cammus had certain financial problems; they couldn't continue the sponsorship.

Thonet & Vander is different; it's not a brand 100% dedicated to simracing, so they only provide money and headsets, and we generate content with their advertising. They targeted just one championship because it's broadcast on TV (it's the most important league in South America and is broadcast on Fox Sports ARG).

If you're willing, you can send some pedals, and we can generate content on social media. You can be sure that the South American sim racing world will see it, and your brand (which isn't well-known in these parts) will start to be mentioned. I like their commission system; it's very clear.

Our IG: https://www.instagram.com/jmf.motorsport/


Juan E. Pelizzari
